title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . can also embed plots, example:  case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(mypkgr) ## basic example code summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00

title: Multivariate-Normal probability density function — mvnpdf
code: mvnpdf(x, mean = rep(0, nrow(x)), varcovM = diag(nrow(x)), Log = TRUE)

title: Multivariate-Normal probability density function — mvnpdf
text: x p x n data matrix n number observations p number dimensions mean mean vector varcovM variance-covariance matrix Log logical flag returning log probability density function. Default TRUE.

title: Multivariate-Normal probability density function — mvnpdf
text: list containing input matrix x y multivariate-Normal probability density function computed x
